title: Glitch Energy Scope Capture (Rising Edge, 1 LSB Step)
summary: Oscilloscope capture of DAC output glitch during a 1 LSB step rising transition with LDAC trigger.

structured_data.description: Annotated traces show VOUT at 500 uV/div, trigger pulse at 5 V/div, time scale 2 us/div, transition from code 800h to 801h, and visible LDAC clock feed-through.
